title: Chemiosmotic theory with 5 with answer options

content.question: According to the chemiosmotic theory (chemiosmotic coupling), the energy required to move protons from the mitochondrial matrix to the intermembrane space against a concentration gradient comes most directly from

choices.label: photons of red or blue light
the breakdown of high-energy fatty acids in the mitochondrial matrix
electrons flowing along the electron transport chain

content.answer: electrons flowing along the electron transport chain
